summary:
Here is a summary of the document in 3-5 sentences, focusing on the main topic and key concepts:

The document provides guidance on finding players for a Call of Cthulhu game, as well as tips for preparing to play the game. To find players, consider reaching out to friends, family, local hobby stores, and gaming conventions. Additionally, online communities and roleplaying societies at schools and universities can be a great source of potential players. To create an immersive atmosphere for the game, consider setting up a dedicated gaming space, minimizing distractions, and using suitable music to establish a mood.
